alert.note: Alert for Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 8:08PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, The east bank of the South Fork of the Forked Deer River overflows, flooding low-lying areas of the University of Tennessee Agriculture Experiment Station. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 35.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Saturday was 36.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 34.4 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
